page.title: 01WHAT IT'S ALL ABOUT
page.content: {Firstly,}the geography of the area is described - mostly hilly grassland with sheep and some cattle. A considerable area is mixed woodland. {Tedburn School}features heavily in this survey. Most of the information was collected by the pupils. The information is accurate but it gives a child's eye view. {The Parish Council}have kindly allowed extracts from the minutes of one of their meetings to be included in order to provide an authentic feel of village 'government'. {Both the Anglican and Methodist {Churches}still make an important contribution to the spiritual and social life of the area. {Other} pages were suggested by the children and information provided by the people concerned, e.g. Village Stores and The Donkey Sanctuary.
